response.overview: t’s a story that had to come out—and now… it has!  Something stinks at Lincoln High School, and it’s not the lunch meat.  Back in 2010 someone started pooping in the urinals. Sure, it was funny the first time, but when it kept happening, it really left a mark…one you couldn’t just pee off.  Now, fifteen years later, a daring reporter is trying to uncover the truth: Who was the Unipooper? But can he let the truth out and hold in his sanity?
response.title: Unipooper
